actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that no Member who is 70 years of age or older may be elected to be the chairman of a standing committee.

summary.text: Provides, under the Rules of the House of Representatives, that no Member who is seventy years of age or older may be elected to be the chairman of a standing committee.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that no Member who is 70 years of age or older may be elected to be the chairman of a standing committee.
